scripts.clean: npm run clean:build & npm run clean:lock & npm run clean:dependencies & npm run clean:zip & npm run delete:phpcs_error & node ./bin/remove.js ./playwright-report ./playwright
scripts.setup: npm run clean & npm install --force && composer install && husky install && playwright install
scripts.test:e2e: npm run docker start && playwright test
scripts.test: npm run test:unit & npm run test:e2e
scripts.start: npm run clean:build && composer dump-autoload && wp-scripts start
scripts.build: npm run clean:build && composer dump-autoload -o &&  wp-scripts build
scripts.build:zip: npm run clean:zip && npm run build && node ./bin/build.js && node ./bin/buildZip.js
